scripts.dev:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 USE_MONGODB=false USE_REDIS=false pnpm -C backend exec ts-node --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.dev:frontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 pnpm exec vite --config frontend/vite.config.ts
scripts.deploy:interactive: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh'
scripts.deploy:full: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key INTERACTIVE=0 bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh'
scripts.prod:build: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --pull
scripts.prod:up: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.prod:ps: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml ps
scripts.prod:logs: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f --tail=100
scripts.prod:build:backend: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --pull backend && pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d backend
scripts.prod:build:frontend: pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --pull frontend && pnpm exec docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh 2'
scripts.deploy:multi: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-multi-domain.sh'
scripts.deploy:frontend: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh 3'
scripts.deploy:health: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh 5'
scripts.deploy:diagnostic: pnpm exec bash -c 'SERVER=217.198.6.238 DEST=/opt/mockmate SSH_KEY=$HOME/.ssh/timeweb_vps_key bash scripts/deploy-quick.sh 8'
